column2: "What's that sound? Weapons clashing...? Is there a battle nearby?"
"What's wrong? For being made of metal, you sure aren't very tough! This is boring! Fight harder!"
"...This is awful."
"What do you think you're doing? This is my playground, and I'm not about to hand it over."
"Hmmm... never mind the Cast, but I've seen you before, haven't I?"
"It's <%me>, Master Gettemhart. You met on Naberius."
"Ah, right, right. That loser. This won't do! I should at least remember the names of my prey."
"But since you're here, then that masked bastard must be here, too, right?"
"...or do you think you can entertain me?"
"Get out of my sight, woman. I have no interest in you."
"So you're the ARKS member that caused all the destruction around here!"
"Destruction? What of it? That's what we do as ARKS, right?"
"We go down to planets and destroy all the enemies in our way. And that's just what I'm doing."
"That's not true. We also take care of the local inhabitants..."
"I don't want to listen to your useless drivel."
"Yeah, like we should care about natives that have surely been infected by Darkers. They'll only attack us."

"That's right, isn't it,
<%me>?"
"1. Nod your head."
"2. Shake your head."
"See, I knew you saw it my way. We share the same nature, you and I!"
"<%me> isn't like that!"
"Unlike you, <%me> understands reality!"
"Heh."
"Oh-hoh! Looks like we've got another bleeding heart here!"
"Fine, be that way. But you can't hide your true feelings. Not from me."
"What's with this little twerp? He just keeps staring this way."
"It doesn't matter. He's probably already infected by the Darkers. Watch, he'll come after us when we turn our backs."
"So... I'll just smash his little skull in here and now. Save us all the trouble later."
"Stop!"
"What?"
"Are you okay? Get out of here!"
"You'd sacrifice yourself to save an enemy? You really are a moron."
"He's not an enemy! The Lillipans have saved me before, that's why this time I-"
"<%me>... are you this craven, too?"
"You really just don't get it, do you?"
"Even these little furballs are going to end up infected, and then they'll come after us."
"Really, tearing them to pieces now is only humane..."
"Aww, don't give me that look, you worthless Cast."
"This is getting old! Let's go, Sina!"

"...understood.
<%me>, please excuse us."
"Sina! Move it!"
"...I'm okay, the injury isn't very serious. I'm built to be pretty sturdy."
"I know... there's some truth to what he said, I know..."
"If they get infected by the Darkers, then we'll have no choice to but to fight them..."
"I know that thanking them might be pointless. There's a chance I'm just delaying the inevitable."
"But still, I'd like to believe there's a purpose in what I'm doing."
"Were you worried about me? Thanks, but I'm fine. Really."
"That was pretty hairy, but I guess it turned out okay."
"It may take a while, but I'm not giving up."
"The tyrant in dunes"
"第３章 砂塵の奥"
